title: The Carpentries Lesson HTML Templates
text: project University York themed fork {varnish} Carpentries Workbench (derived similar fork University Sheffield. serves template internally developed Carpentries style lessons. bespoke theme, must installed directly, rather using default installed via {sandpaper} package. changes theme replace Carpentries branding University York. html templates use mustache templating language CSS JavaScript compiled minified GitHub Actions.

title: The Carpentries Lesson HTML Templates
text: fork varnish used official carpentries repositories, intended internally developed courses University York order use fork varnish must update config.yaml include lines # Customisation section (update [user] user/organisation [repo] repository name replacing line custom domain required). need call package directly, config.yaml updated {sandpaper} detect copy styling templates lesson website building GitHub pages. config.yaml customised, typical guides Carpentries can followed deploy locally GitHub pages.

title: The Carpentries Lesson HTML Templates
text: rendering site locally varnish , default, applied since available. extra steps setup install necessary packages required. can install varnish system wide using {devtools} Alternatively can install varnish {renv}. don’t already renv installed install install.packages("renv"). initialise renv workbench repository cloned. Start R install varnish {sandpaper} package (pull dependencies) renv snapshot . can now build serve pages University Sheffield varnish. NB find varnish isn’t applied may need first load library library(uoyvarnish).
code: > install.packages("devtools") > devtools::install_github("ResearchCodingClub/uoy-varnish") cd ~/path/to/workbench/repo/ Rscript -e "renv::init()" > renv::install("ResearchCodingClub/uoy-varnish") > options(repos = c(     carpentries = "https://carpentries.r-universe.dev/",     CRAN = "https://cran.rstudio.com/")) > renv::install("sandpaper", dep = TRUE) > renv::snapshot() > sandpaper::serve()
